name: Protoplanet
description:
A submission to Ludum Dare 45 with the theme Start with Nothing. Starting with nothing but a rock, seek out and absorb the mass of nearby asteroids to grow your fledgling planet.

Controls: use A & D or left/right arrow keys to rotate the cursor. Use space bar to grapple passing asteroids.

Created by Nathan Ridling and Brian Humphreys.

Thank you for playing!
